divs: Sighting Detailsslightly faster than plane slowly dimmed and ascended out of atmosphere there were planes in the sky to compare to very bright at first then slowly dimmed and disappeared I was with my boyfriend as he was smoking a cigarette and we were talking and as I hugged him I noticed the object in the sky. We then both watched as the object dimmed and ascended into space. The object slowly moved in an outward and upward direction into space. We were both awe-struck, but this wasn't the first time we had seen something like that before. It feels amazing seeing something like that, like there are secrets the majority of us humans do not know. It may be the government, or something else.
Summary: star like ball of light brighter than average star moving slightly faster than plane slowly dimmed and ascended out of atmosphere
